content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is not connected to any power source and the boiler is out of fuel, indicating that the generator is currently non-operational.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
The lab is currently not receiving power and cannot operate.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
The assembling machine is not receiving electricity and cannot create automation-science-pack due to missing resources.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups that connect various entities, with one working fluid system (fluid system 46246) that is currently operational.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting power sources
- Ensure that the steam engine and boiler are connected to an operational power source to avoid the "No operational power sources found to connect to" error.

### Errors with boiler fuel
- Make sure to have coal or another fuel type in inventory to refuel the boiler. Check inventory before attempting to refuel.

### Errors with boiler operation
- If the boiler is still not operational after refueling, verify that it is connected to a water source and that there are no blockages in the pipe connections.

### Errors with assembling machine resources
- Ensure that the assembling machine has the necessary resources (copper-plate and iron-gear-wheel) in inventory to create the desired product.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
